segments.text: Good morning ! Welcome to our bank ! How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning ! I'm Steven Smith . I want to open an account here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ! Come this way please . You should fill a form here first . Here you are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much ! And then what ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you don't mind , Mr . Smith , please go to counter number six to queue up and wait for the service .
segments.speaker: S1
